name: marisuto-drop-probability
description: This application calculates and shows the chance to get your desired character in Marisa and Alice's cookie storia.

scripts.build: `npm bin`/babel -d dist src && `npm bin`/browserify dist/index.main.js | `npm bin`/uglifyjs -o dist/index.main.min.js && `npm bin`/browserify dist/item.main.js | `npm bin`/uglifyjs -o dist/item.main.min.js

author: Koji TADOKORO
